thread.title: Man Utd news: Jose Mourinho trolls Manchester City ahead of Chelsea clash | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd news: Jose Mourinho trolls Manchester City ahead of Chelsea clash | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd news: Jose Mourinho trolls Manchester City ahead of Chelsea clash | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 8:19 pm Jose Mourinho trolled Man City after Man United’s win in Europe (Picture: Getty) 
Jose Mourinho bizarrely mocked Manchester City ahead of Manchester United’s FA Cup quarter-final clash with Chelsea at Stamford Bridge. Jose Mourinho provides injury update on Mkhitaryan and Carrick ahead of EFL Cup final 
The Red Devils strolled through to the last-16 of the Europa League on Wednesday night after winning 1-0 away at Saint-Etienne and 4-0 over the two legs. 
United’s progression in the Europa League means they must face Chelsea just three days before they play their next European fixture. 
And, after the win at Saint-Etienne, Mourinho said: ‘I cannot go to Chelsea with the second team or Under-21s like Manchester City did last year.’ Jose Mourinho mocked ‘noisy neighbours’ Man City (Picture: Getty) 
Manuel Pellegrini famously fielded five teenage full debutants in February 2016 and City went on to lose 5-1 at Stamford Bridge. 
Mourinho insisted he will not do the same on March 13, adding: ‘I cannot do that, we are Manchester United.’
